data.comment: The match is underway. Antwerp have kicked-off.
Ilombe Mboyo puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Guldensporenstadion.
Kortrijk kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a first substitution, with Lior Refaelov replacing Junior Pius.
In the minute 58, Ivan Leko is making the team's second substitution at Guldensporenstadion with Birger Verstraete replacing Ritchie De Laet.
Own goal! Trent Sainsbury scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
Antwerp make their third substitution with Nill De Pauw replacing Manuel Benson.
In the minute 69, Julien De Sart for Kortrijk has been booked by Alexandre Boucaut and receives a first yellow card.
Michiel Jonckheere is replacing Eric Ocansey for the home team.
Jovan Stojanovic is on a sub for Julien De Sart for Kortrijk.
In the minute 82, Goal! Lior Refaelov gives Antwerp a 1-2 lead in Kortrijk.
At Guldensporenstadion, Kristof D'Haene has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The home team replace Evgen Makarenko with Habib Gueye.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Antwerp take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Dieumerci Mbokani.
